burstrate: Up to 12.1 fps for up to 6 frames; Up to 9.4 fps for 7 or more frames
whitebalancemodes: Auto, Daylight, Cloudy, Tungsten, Fluorescent, Fluorescent H, Flash, Underwater, Custom 1, Custom 2
flashmodes: Auto, Flash On, Slow Synchro, Flash Off
exposuremodes: Manual Exposure, Program Shift, Safety Shift, AE Lock, Compensation: Still Images: +3 stops in 1/3-stop increments
focusrange: Normal: 2.0 in. (5cm) - infinity (W), 12 in. (30cm) - infinity (T); Auto/Manual: 1.2 in. (3cm) - infinity (W), 12 in. (30cm) - infinity (T); Macro AF: 1.2 in. - 1.6 ft. (3-50cm) (W), 12 in. - 1.6 ft. (30-50cm) (T); Quick: 4.9 - 66 ft. (1.5 - 20m) (W,T)
